name: ORS National Incident Reporting  Deliberate Damage Costs
description: FIN0069 - v00.00.1 Report to list Nationally Incidents with Damage Costs.

dataset.name: Incident Damage Query
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID AS INCIDENT_CASE_ID, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') AS INCIDENT_DATE, AT_QUESTIONNAIRES.DESCRIPTION AS DESCRIPTION, AT_INCIDENT_CASE_RESPONSES.RESPONSE_COMMENT_TEXT AS RESPONSE_COMMENT_TEXT, AT_INCID_LOC.DESCRIPTION AS INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT_NAME FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_INCID_LOC, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASES AT_INCIDENT_CASES, OMS_OWNER.QUESTIONNAIRES AT_QUESTIONNAIRES, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASE_RESPONSES AT_INCIDENT_CASE_RESPONSES, OMS_OWNER.QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS AT_QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS, OMS_OWNER.INCIDENT_CASE_QUESTIONS AT_INCIDENT_CASE_QUESTIONS WHERE (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_QUESTIONS.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_RESPONSES.INCIDENT_CASE_ID = AT_INCIDENT_CASE_QUESTIONS.INCIDENT_CASE_ID AND AT_INCIDENT_CASE_RESPONSES.QUESTION_SEQ = AT_INCIDENT_CASE_QUESTIONS.QUESTION_SEQ) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASE_QUESTIONS.QUESTIONNAIRE_QUE_ID = AT_QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.QUESTIONNAIRE_QUE_ID) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_TYPE = AT_QUESTIONNAIRES.CODE) AND (AT_QUESTIONNAIRES.QUESTIONNAIRE_CATEGORY = ('IR_TYPE')) AND (AT_INCIDENT_CASES.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_INCID_LOC.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(AT_INCIDENT_CASES.INCIDENT_DATE, 'DD/MM/YYYY'), 'DD/MM/YYYY') BETWEEN TO_DATE('01-01-2016 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE('01-04-2016 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_QUESTIONNAIRE_QUESTIONS.DESCRIPTION IN ('ESTIMATED COST OF DAMAGE'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT INCIDENT_CASE_ID, INCIDENT_DATE, DESCRIPTION, RESPONSE_COMMENT_TEXT, INCIDENT_ESTABLISHMENT_NAME FROM dataset_base_)
